short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform LinkedIn's suggested content into productivity tools. Replace unwanted posts with todos and inspirational quotes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkedInProductivity transforms your LinkedIn feed into a distraction-free, productive space. Instead of seeing suggested posts, irrelevant social content, or unnecessary comments, you'll see your personal todo list and inspirational quotes.

â€¢ Smart Content Filtering
Automatically identifies and replaces distracting content
Preserves important posts about hiring and job opportunities
Customizable skip words to keep content that matters to you

â€¢ Built-in Todo Manager
Add and manage todos directly from your LinkedIn feed
Check off completed items in real-time
Numbered tasks for easy tracking
Comes with helpful starter tasks to guide you
Todo list syncs across your browser

â€¢ Inspirational Quotes
Replace distracting content with motivational quotes
Customize your own quote collection
Clean, professional display

â€¢ Customization Options
Add your own skip words to preserve specific content
Manage your quotes collection
Dynamic layout that adapts to your content

ðŸŽ¯ Getting Started:
The extension comes pre-configured with:

Two starter tasks to help you learn the interface:
"Remove distracting content on LinkedIn" (pre-checked)
"Add a task by clicking '+ Add Task'" (ready for you to complete)
Default skip words: "hiring" and "starting" to preserve job opportunities
A collection of inspirational quotes you can customize

ðŸ”’ Privacy & Security:
â€¢ No data collection or tracking
â€¢ Works entirely in your browser
â€¢ No external server communication
â€¢ Your todos and settings are stored locally in Chrome

ðŸ’¡ How It Works:

Install the extension
Browse LinkedIn normally
Distracting content is automatically replaced with your todos and quotes
Click "+ Add Task" to manage todos directly in your feed
Customize skip words to preserve important content

Perfect for:
â€¢ Professionals seeking a distraction-free LinkedIn experience
â€¢ Job seekers who want to focus on opportunities
â€¢ Anyone looking to combine productivity with networking

The extension is lightweight, respects your privacy, and transforms LinkedIn into a dual-purpose platform: professional networking and personal task management.

Note: This extension is not affiliated with LinkedIn. It is an independent tool designed to enhance your LinkedIn browsing experience.
